ComplaintParticipant.name: ComplaintParticipant
ComplaintParticipant.description: Represents a junction between a public complaint, and an account or a contact. This object stores the details of the participant who registers a complaint with the authorities. This participant could be the applicant, co-applicant, a household, or even a business account.

Comments.description: The comments about why the participant has access to the public complaint.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the participant's association with the public complaint is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the complaint participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the complaint participant record.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role associated with the complaint participant record.

PublicComplaintId.description: The public complaint associated with the complaint participant record.

Role.description: Specifies the role of the complaint participant.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the complaint participant.
